title: EcoBoost Battle: Fiesta ST vs Mustang
description:
Is it better to buy a new EcoBoost Mustang, or -for equal money- a Fiesta ST and a whole bunch of go-fast parts? Matt Farah decides.

Each week, /DRIVE will air a segment from last season's /DRIVE+, to show you what people have been watching for the past 3 months. New content on /DRIVE+ every week. New shows, new cars, new experiences. 

Don't wait 3 months to see it. Support /DRIVE, and subscribe today.
tags: Ford Mustang, Ford Fiesta, EcoBoost, Turbo, Eco Boost
